prompt: Design a photo gallery viewer with a bold, urban aesthetic. The main image, featuring a graffiti wall, should have sharp 8px rounded corners and a strong black shadow (opacity 0.2, blur 10px). Include a horizontal thumbnail gallery with 7 images (65x65px, 6px corners, 8px spacing) in a dark gray container (#424242). Place three action buttons in a centered row at the bottom: a red heart icon (#F44336), a yellow share icon (#FFCA28), and a white download icon (#FFFFFF), each in a square container with 14px padding and a black background (#212121). Use a dark gray scaffold background (#303030) with 18px padding. The app bar should have a black background (#212121), a white back arrow, and a title 'Urban Gallery' in white bold text. The design should feel gritty, modern, and compact with balanced spacing.
